Nukuoro figures of Micronesia were made as abstract figures with smooth wood in order for them to
choicesHtml: represent the inner essence of the most powerful creator god
embody local deities and be honored with feathers, paint, and woven fiber decoration
depict guardians that protected agricultural crops during the growing season
portray young adults who have recently completed initiation ceremonies
